nodes.text: Howard Gersh was a computer graphics artist at Industrial Light & Magic for the special edition of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, digital effects artist for Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back and Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, sequence supervisor and development lead for Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, sequence supervisor and development lead for Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones and digital effects artist for Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith
